name: Spring Bee
description:
Can you Bee-lieve that its a spring ?

Well lets get back to work.

Your a Spring Bee collecting nectar from flowers in the garden.

Sound easy? Well Plants wont let that happen so easily. 

Good Luck! See you in the game.
